other_tests.findings: Low radioactive tracer speed in both limbs
Visualizing lymphatic vessels in contrast to the background
Identified three rare single nucleotide variations (SNVs) in the PIEZO1 gene
other_tests.changes_over_time: Confirmation of SNVs in all four family members and co-segregation with DHS

other_tests.findings: No additional pathogenic variations identified in known primary lymphedema genes
